problem_text: In the figure, m \angle 1 = 4 p + 15, m \angle 3 = 3 p - 10 and m \angle 4 = 6 r + 5. Find the value of r.
compact_text: In the figure, m \angle 1 = 4p+15, m \angle 3 = 3p-10 and m \angle 4 = 6r+5. Find the value of r.
annotat_text: In the figure, $m \angle 1=4 p+15$, $m \angle 3=3 p-10$ and $m \angle 4=6 r+5 $. Find the value of $r$.
